Name: Godspell Defender
About the game: This unique arcade game will deliver a quick and simple experience designed around making a few perfectly placed shots. Button mashing will do you no good. There are ten distinct spells in the game that must be combined to maximize damage, creating the ultimate god spell. MASSIVE COMBOS EVERY SHOT MATTERS Hold the left mouse button to charge up your shot Press the right mouse button to unleash a screen-clearing bomb
